title: Some Vivo devices with Qualcomm processors can now be bootloader unlocked, unofficially
content:
Whatâ€™s the best modding-friendly Android OEM in the market right now? Depending on who you ask this question to, the answer could range from Google to OnePlus to Xiaomi to something else entirely. And that is perfectly alright, as each of those companies have their own strengths and weaknesses when it comes to aftermarket development,

The post Some Vivo devices with Qualcomm processors can now be bootloader unlocked, unofficially appeared first on XDA.
description: You can now unofficially unlock the bootloader of the Vivo X70 Pro Plus and a couple of other Vivo smartphones. Read on to know more!
